Posts.EditableText: Does Get Input advance turnscripts/counters? My instinct is that it doesn't but I can't find confirmation of that.
Posts.HTML: Does Get Input advance turnscripts/counters? My instinct is that it doesn't but I can't find confirmation of that.

Posts.EditableText: I would think not, because turnscripts are run from the function `FinishTurn`, which is now run by the parser whenever a command is successfully executed.
Posts.HTML: I would think not, because turnscripts are run from the function FinishTurn, which is now run by the parser whenever a command is successfully executed.
